page.title: 09St.Andrews Church (future)
page.content:
For a long time the church has been saving to build a new church on the Park and after many donations has saved Â£300,000 towards an estimated cost of Â£800,000.The land has been given by the developers and the money is being raised for the building.
the work will begin in January 1986 and open in July 1987.The new church will be very modern and be built on two levels.
It will be a church family centre with worship centre,chapel,play group area,bookstall and an open all-day canteen.
